data.md:MetaData: Grain-size composition of sediment core PS75/214-1

8 core sections: 0-0.73, 0.73-1.73, 1.73-2.73, 2.73-3.72, 3.72-4.72, 4.72-5.72, 5.72-6.72, 6.72-7.72 m, 1 sample nose from core cutter, 1 sample from core catcher, 1 sample from gravity core surface, foraminifera in near surface sediments, diamicton below, Redeployment of overpenetrated core PS75/161-1
Grounding-line retreat of the West Antarctic Ice Sheet from inner Pine Island Bay
